comments.body: Extend the mechanism used by the high quality image updater to all image downloading in which the image is downloaded first to a temporary file (the image filename prefixed with a "~") and then renamed to the actual name (by removing prefix). **Summary:** about image download - download to temp file first. (was: about image download) **Status:** Accepted **Owner:** lodici123 **Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
fixed in https://bitbucket.org/lodici/magarena/commits/67784634d584e4037727c230b2b621d8df75e654 .

All images are first downloaded to their image filename with a "~" prefix. Once the download is complete the temp file is renamed by removing the prefix. So now, if during image download the internet connection goes down, it will not affect the actual card image.

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
